lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So be back here in a few minutes, guys! (drumming battle music) (drumming battle music continues)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gripping her holy symbol in one hand, and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With this knowledge, one thought plays in repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sound of a gun cocking and firing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the battlefield, he’ll support his allies, but rarely draws blood unless it’s to protect fellow gnome, Pike. Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But overall, I think I’m quite friendly for a Dragonborn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn’t enough, (ringing weapons SFX) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also he is adorable, and gives expert massages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got the party showing off their Critical Role positive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But if you guys are into it, we thought about doing a limited run of these and making this the first of our fan-designed t shirts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if you guys will like this, let us know, and maybe we'll make it happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm wearing one right now in my underpants, which we will be selling next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and there might be some stills of that to order.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to wear mine next game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People seem to be, and we'll be putting more designs out, getting some shirt possibilities to you guys in the near future.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let us know in the chat guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just gave everyone in the party rupees, treasure!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you go to fantasycoinhq.com he makes - Matt's holding up a dwarven coin at the moment - they make gems, they make fantasy coins, nerd coins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we doing free ads now for people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is just a thank you!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If these were rupees, this is what they would feel like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of want to throw them at people across the room!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I want to trade them, put them in a pouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's kick into the game proper, guys! Let's get some proper music playing, because that's what I do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That’s what I baby do right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After a few fateful encounters, the return of your gnome cleric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glass container being shattered, of course, by an explosive arrow created by Percy and fired by Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the very start of the battle, led into a very rough battle with this strange mutating ooze that kept splitting and splitting, until through some good teamwork, crafty use of telekinesis and a nearby lava pool, and general high damage rolls, you guys managed to survive the encounter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which allowed you to retrieve your bear Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we rested? Are we in some need of rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we around? What's near us? Is this just a tunnel? Is there any sort of shelter, caves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're by that lake with the giant monster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We circled all the way back around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And went down to that place that you told us not to go in the first place? Yeah, that's where we ended up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How was that for you? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a pool of water at the bottom where the aboleth was in the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just barely survived the chat room and now we need to rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it easy on us, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys also just woke up about 2, 3 hours ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, so we don't really - oh, we can take hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully you stayed out of the fray.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I need to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did use one of your Dominate spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the rest of you who need to heal up can use this time to take a short rest and use your hit dice to heal up on your own.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone need some healing? Are we all okay? Are we all good?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's everybody at in terms of...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You mean like in life, or?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we survey the area, how many tunnels we looking at? What's our options here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are currently in this section about to go deeper into this tunnel where a series of small magma trickles are pouring out of the rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we never went up to the war camp and through it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We sealed up the way behind us, ran in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't want to go up and through the camp again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, we're going into the cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're going to backtrack the way we came to that war camp road, yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're going into the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see the visual aid?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, we are going into the lava tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, in through the tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I’ll just follow. I thought I understood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean there might be something to be gleaned from going back to the war camp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys came through here, you traveled across over the war camp, went back here and tunneled below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So now we're going into this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just to make sure that my memory is on point--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --Before we circled back around, we hit a fork in the road where we could have gone up and we could have gone down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's behind us, we're going down down down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota took a large black iron duergar bolt to the chest earlier and is mostly recovered but is still even more hunched than usual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A slight wheeze that's always to him still present.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys begin to push down into this lower chasm, the temperature of the air itself grows steadily warmer and warmer with a drier heat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourselves, especially those of you with thick armor--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --You find that sweat beads begin to trickle down the side of your face--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --And begin to pool and gather in parts of your chestplate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, if you'd like me to hold your armor or do you want me to take it off for a little while?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I'll keep it on just for safety.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let it hang out a little bit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just saying, you might feel more comfortable with a loose fitting sort of cloak?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not creepy! I'm just trying to be mindful!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very considerate of you, a gentleman's offer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it’s okay. I'll keep it on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just have to use my imagination.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what we'll call it from now on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molten hot magma, I knew it was coming.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (murmurs) I was just wondering if it would happen.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I feel a bit weaker now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can be walked on the side of safely at about 2 or 3 at shoulder width, but you only have about a 15 foot width here and the rest of it is just extremely bright, hot, molten rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it hurt us to get near it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but it's uncomfortable and something to be very aware of and to watch your step.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, you don't have any way of - say it gets hotter than this? You don't have any way of getting some water out here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh! I do! And I pull out an empty bottle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, I've seen that bottle a lot. What does it do?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This one - they're both empty bottles - but this one is an air bottle and this one is a water bottle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! Thank you! That clears that up! (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it make a lot of water?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! This, if we ever need air--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's the water one that you just pulled out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but what about water? Oh my.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This, if we need water - And I do a small stream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So a little bit of water just begins to pour perpetually, and without seeming end due to the size of the bottle.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So, if you want to just squirt - and I do a small, little squirt-blasts on Scanlan.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, of course it is! Why would I carry a non-magical item on me? That's ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, should we try to cross this little path here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my tracking to see any of those duergar? To see if any of them have passed through the area; if there's a large group of them ahead of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can use my tracking and my favored terrain to see how many within 6 miles, if there's a large group of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for your tracking check on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it for the Star Wars trailer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is with advantage, I believe, because it's your favored terrain, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also notice some of the walls have what looks like small, localized cave-ins, almost as if something had burrowed through at one time or another.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Large, large creatures. So, there's also things that exist outside of the tunnel system.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, as quickly as possible, we should get through these tunnels, I assume?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note though, you said within 6 miles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or, at least, a population of duergar amassed in a central place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check out the brain on Brad!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 3 to 4 miles up, you said, from where we are at this point?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably start stealthing at this point, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I was about to say I'd like to move ahead of the group a bit and start sneaking along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's do that! Go ahead and roll stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have advantage like my sister had for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we all try to stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be a group stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A chamber nearly a mile and a half across from this visual point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can probably surmise somewhere in the neighborhood of about 20 to 25 of these structures, all localized in this one area that is punctuated with - you can count about 7 of these black obsidian spires that rise out at different points around like watchtowers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that you can see closest to you, which is about a quarter mile off, you can just barely make out what looks like a couple of duergar walking across one of the upper levels and what looks like some sort of ballista and/or anti-personnel weapon that is put--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is where Kima’s being held.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Plus, it’s a really big thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A massive magma fall descends from the rocky ceiling, right above the stronghold, onto the roof and is forked onto each side and then continues to flow down, buttressing each side of the stronghold almost as a defense mechanism, like they built it intentionally underneath this magma fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that’s where the trapdoor is!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was with you the whole time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, but you were never paying attention.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You got that new magazine and you’ve been staring at it a long time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you recall any of the details from your vision, from your dreams?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All of this looks familiar, and I think we’re in the right place.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we know what else is around? What was the building again? With the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That’s what it’s been referred to as.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The temple of where apparently K'Varn as far as you know exists is further below in the fungal forest that surrounds this ancient city ruin that has been repurposed by the illithids that Clarota actually came from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes! And we know here, because the general that we mind melded - Clarota read his brain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah yeah, good, thank you for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You had this very vivid look the whole time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So remember, Scanlan, that the general said that on the left side of the fortress--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --is how we can get into the trapdoor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How we can get into the trapdoor, exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the smaller of two lava flows.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So what we’re looking at is the fortress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You’re looking at Emberhold itself, the center of the duergar society and from what you’ve gleaned from two different duergar that you’ve interrogated, supposedly where Lady Kima has been held should she still--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From our vantage point can we see the two lava flows that we were warned about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That stronghold is probably a good mile and a half away from you right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, there is a lot of cover as we go near it because of all the…?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a lot of cover, yes, but it’s a lot of open area with cover, so it’s one of those you’re just going to have to be careful as you move through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long would it take you to make a nuclear weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it’s pretty dark here, the only reason you can see much is because of the low light vision.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A very long time. If I start it right now..

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even at this radius, things you could see nearby, a light source would be very helpful in making sure that you can see details and not fall in anything you don’t want to, but it also makes you very visible to anything else out there, so you have to decide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Between the lava and the red stones, the twins can see, correct? Because of the dim light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see near, but these are things that are a mile away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The reason you can make out this small city and Emberhold itself is because there are clusters of the red glowstone used within that city and the giant magma fall that currently envelops the sides of the stronghold, making it very, very visible and easy to pick out against the rest of the cavern.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So this is a whole little city down here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we should keep to the left and head down that direction and try to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm actually gonna go ahead and cast Pass Without A Trace.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's the thing that saved our butts last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you find yourself now much easier to slip into the surrounding shadows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just over here, over there, put a little on Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? We've got a really large amount.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We don't know how many times it's saved us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) We've got a really large amount.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to find this trap door, because it's suicide going in the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. And Lady Kima's being held here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we need to find it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, so we're heading left and going--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The twins will creep - continue ahead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, you guys real stealthy, so--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll take point on the group that's following.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys take care of Trinket as I'm ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (growling sounds) Me and Trinket are telling jokes in the back of the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's a very rocky and difficult terrain should you not be with your ranger, who has the Underdark as her favored terrain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'll go back, then. Should I? Or is it okay because we're all together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say essentially you're just marking places where the terrain would be dangerous, to watch your step and to be wary of any locations that might be unsafe for load bearing, anything like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You calling me load bearing? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Specific. As you guys begin to curve around the left, everyone roll a perception check real fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only if you're proficient with perception.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's either a 6 or a 9. No idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there a dot on the bottom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Both Percy and Vax simultaneously put their arms out to hold everyone back as you instinctively--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably the ones that go up and down the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we create a distraction and get rid of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, I could completely hide myself standing there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many are there? Are you gonna kill--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far away are we from them? Like, in distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not closing directly on you, because they're doing a slightly different path.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're taking the path that we're not on, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I want to hear what they're saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so all of you guys, who's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll all hide. I go ahead and cast Guidance on Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll pull it up here real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, then don't. Keep Pass Without A Trace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we could just get this party started right here, if we want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me see, it might just be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, sorry, you don't have my guidance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't we go just up ahead and scout?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little bit ahead and see what we can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get up to a point where you're maybe 10 feet from the road and with your backs against the rock, you can begin to see the roving band slowly move around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You count, at quick glance, roughly 12 to 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys roll a perception check right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check. Specific for this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no! I get advantage on perception, because I'm in my favored terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can also perceive, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as you're listening to the conversation, you specifically, being able to understand Undercommon--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “Shut up and keep walking.” And they all keep pushing. At which point, the same scared one from before says: “I mean, if that one went crazy, well, “can't the other ones crack, too? “I don't know if I feel safe around any of K'varn's pets anymore at this rate.” And by that point, they begin to slowly move past and their voices begin to fade, as they continue up the path you guys just traversed down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually a very good thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched voice) Is it? Did I do something good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have, like, bear tracks and a giant goliath, like, what-- (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're working. You don't have time to eat.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (off screen) Instajur and somebody who didn't put their name on it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god, that's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sound of the duergar walking eventually fades and you feel pretty confident that you're safe to return to the rest of the party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Secondly, there's some weirdo creature that's gotten loose and is very, very bad and it's killed multiple duergar already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No indication of what kind of a creature it was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could've been the thing with the plate that showed up in the camp, I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The thing in the red rider wagon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could've been that, I'm not sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Regardless, we should be very careful, traveling forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've seen your sheet, you don't speak French.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could use that to our advantage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We could scare them off quite easily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had a grandmother who did, okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like the way you think. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we keep moving forward at a very stealthy sort of pace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys push forward, keeping that wide, kind of left curve, which adds a fair amount of time to your travel, as you're being careful and moving at a very very heavy, circular arc around the duergar city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, there's a trap door somewhere, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (old man voice) There’s doors in them there caves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That'll be the fortress, maybe, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Possibly. Could be farther. Can we see the molten things that he was talking about? The lava flows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does split up at certain points, you can begin to start making it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where does the magma runoff lead to? Does it just pour out? Does it fill a moat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About an hour of travel around the side--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If only there were a way to just speed up this exposition somehow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one is a dull crimson.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! We should go towards that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what was the first color? I was still laughing at Percy. What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just eat your banana, the twins will go check it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The twins are gonna go have a peek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan comes with. Go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Scanlan, what did you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way to take one for the team.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just stopped him from farting into his flute.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, this is a huge moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you roll a persuasion against a critical fail? Can you? Can you persuade a crit fail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, Pike, roll a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, d20. Uh, that's a half a d20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue up with the twins, absentmindedly humming to yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At about 15, 20 feet out, you notice the coloration is different, because it is completely coated in what looks like dried blood of some kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And immediately to the right of it, along the ground--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --currently your vision is obscured by another, large kind of twisted stalactite, but there appears to be an arm and a whole bunch more dried blood across the ground, just out of view.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Stop! Can we stop? Can we stop?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was singing? (whispering) I was singing? I didn't even know! It's a force of habit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can see anything in the area that has done this recently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the arm attached to whatever did--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --Is the arm part of a dead thing or is it alive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure whatever it is, it's dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I check it out as well? I mean, I'm there, I might as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can also attempt to make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You walk up in this terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're guessing probably within a few days, if not a week, since this happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm picking up one of the arms--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what you see before you are definitely remnants of some battle long past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against these rocky formations there's dried blood everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you recognize the ashy skin from the areas that aren't currently caked with its own gore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're either pulled apart by force--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --like, arms and limbs were wrenched from the body just out of sheer power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or there appears to be some sort of gnawing, some chewing, like toothy fangs, sharp teeth have partially eaten portions of these bodies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the work of a beaver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, definitely, a very large beaver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Based on tracking and everything and insight, can we tell if that creature is anywhere nearby? Or if it's gone?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think it might be foul play, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there is very erratic footsteps that look human size, but they seem to be placed randomly, like one foot here, one foot here, one foot here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) It's that big creature that - it was like one of those things that that thing put together, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see what seem like strange strikes through the sand, like someone had been dragged very quickly in a very localized spot, scattered all about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is. It's a human centipede.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very strange pattern that you can't really grasp what kind of creature would make it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it seems like it was here recently, or a while ago?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, the last time it was here was about two or three days ago, to feast on more of the remains.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we get out of here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could try to set a trap, or we could look and see if we can loot anything? Is there anything to loot? Does it look like anything shiny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to find, across some of the body parts, a couple of blood-soaked gold coin purses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them contains a handful of gems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, those right there. So you can mark that down, until you get a chance to appraise them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we trying to prove? Let's just keep trucking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, put the accordion back in the bag, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was I doing that? It's force of habit, I don't - it's like breathing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to go back to the group, I'm going to bring the arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the cask of ale and pour a little tankard of ale, just because I'm bored.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good man. Well done. It's very tasty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would anyone else like a sip? Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having been underground for what probably amounts now to four or five days, that little taste of ale on your lips is a very welcoming and very refreshing sensation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When we get back to the group, I'm going to toss the arm to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down and see what looks like a duergar arm that has been very heavily mangled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Thanks for the hand! (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we killed a lot of duergar this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a good joke. I considered it, but no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a big centipede-y human, creepy creature that's killed a lot of things and we should probably avoid that at all costs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we have to, we will, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we avoid that and still head left of the keep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we didn't make it into the - was there a structure that we could have entered?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: LIAM & MATT: You're heading towards that structure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. But I mean, where we just were?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you just were? No, there's just all these giant rocky spires jutting out of the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They didn't have doors in them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we probably have looked for like a nest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good. I'm looking for a door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's why the entire terrain here is so dangerous and uninviting, is because of the sheer force that went into its creation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we should just keep freaking being careful and keep going towards the giant thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that something that happened? Am I dreaming?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you just, you know, you weren't paying attention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that makes you want to make out with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A small hit to Scanlan's morale, but the party marches on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I deserved it, I deserved it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, twins in front, here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sake of the length of this journey, I'm going to have the party go ahead and roll a communal stealth check once more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have Pass Without A Trace up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for the love of god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy! Don't bang the guns together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don’t know! I thought it might help.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You have to use the tongue, Scanlan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! I get to do plus 10 bonus to that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's three failures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That bit is key. A one is two failures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're moving, about a quarter mile from the stronghold, Vex, you pick up a strange person standing maybe about 50, 60 feet ahead of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can they see us? Does it look like they can see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment, keeping an eye out, and the person isn't moving. Just standing right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) So. There's a person standing right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) A person. He's just standing there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too dark to make out any details, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I see him now that she's pointed him out to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can hold him. Might piss him off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there is a humanoid, standing on its own.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't seem to be moving, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to go check it out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go invisible and check it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I polymorph and turn into a fly and I buzz over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, if he's magic, he's going to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all right. I've got magic, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You approach this individual and notice it is unmoving and is of a singular, solid color.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What looks to be what is an illithid or a mind flayer is currently locked in some sort of reactionary position, but is completely turned to stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a Medusa type of a thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We faced basilisks once and they did this to Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a lot of things that can do this, actually, to be fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do have basilisk eggs in the bag of holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we should crack one on statue guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I buzz back to the group. (buzzing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what's that? Oh, it's Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A crazy statue of a crazy illithid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we look at Clarota and say: “Do you know anything about this?”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “It's generally used as a threatening device “or a guardian amongst the city.”

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why do you suppose they used it on one of their own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “I can only imagine maybe this transpired “before the union and is left as a warning.”

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we remember how to take care of basilisks? Like, do we not look at them, is that how they don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't look at them. That's correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't look them in the eye? Or don't look at their face?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, that's it. It's a vision thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I believe it's vision based.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be a nature check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For anyone who wishes to make one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, never mind. He's got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just go ahead and dunk on everybody, why don't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially it is a sight-based circumstance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Otherwise, as long as you don't catch their gaze, you'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. It's a good thing we've all been watching Daredevil last week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poor basilisks. Can never make eye contact.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of looks it over for a second--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't think his name was Dave, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “Not the kindest of my people, but, nevertheless, “should all this pass, I would like to, maybe, “release him from this stony prison.”

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you know how to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “I know not, but it can be done. I've seen it.”

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't we have to do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We sprinkled some of its blood on your eyes, if I remember correctly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did. I was very sad.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We used the blood of the creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, there is a liquid that can be distilled from the basilisk blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't have any more of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We also don't know if it's a basilisk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we move this statue off to a safe place, inside or anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been there for a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not give anybody any indication we've been here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got bat poo on it, let's keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It splits and divides towards the center - a larger fall towards the front of the fortress and a thinner one towards the very back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go towards the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Creepy, creepy, creepy towards the thin one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys are all stealthed still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't to need check it again, he didn't tell us to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, I said I wanted to go back and look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see no doorway, as the actual magma is pressing directly against the side of the stronghold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to see if I can figure that out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make an investigate check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a solid wall, with the two magma flows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I double back for the Underdark expert and I bring my sister up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, right, right. Can I come up and look and see if I can see any tracking? If there's any footprints around a certain area around this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See if you can find a false door or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make an investigate check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I thought it was behind--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, no, no, no! I get an advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's open, and the entire thing banks around it and goes deeper still. You guys have made it to the far back wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But from what you can see there is a slight raise beneath the magma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Does it look like it's safe to bring everybody up here or does it seem like anything's around that could see us? Anything looking from above?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And they're just doing slow patrols.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to have to be super--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to have to 007 sniper them out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can handle this, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I can get us into that trap door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have something that can pull it towards you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no no, can you redirect the magma flow around that bulge with your - can't you, move rocks or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you can create a like a little lip for it to go around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or I could, or I was thinking I could cool off the magma and we could break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, maybe you can move it away, and then cool it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they back with us, or are they still stealthing in front?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still stealthing in front, and you guys have come back to the group?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess we came back to the group and told them about what's going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. We can - me and Pike - can take out the guys on the roof.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You want to give it a go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, but he's got sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm thinking that Keyleth should--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but they're a good 200 feet up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If Keyleth can bird up or you could go over on the flying carpet or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can take Pike and we can do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they are they unable to be shot out? Can you not arrow them out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can try to arrow them out too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can get a hit or two, but the chances that she could take them both out at once...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should go up and I'll arrow one and you...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you let the little people have some fun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just afraid if you go up there, that you're going to alarm yourself to other people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How loud is it down there? Is the lava flow making noise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very subtle pops and hisses, but other than that it's pretty quiet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not like the roaring sound of a waterfall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, it's a slow gradual pour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anybody have a "mute" spell of some kind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mute, as in silence noise, or a person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, Pass Without Trace, there's silence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: David Norris? Thank you David Norris for the chicken!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dave, the illithids have it. Thank you, Dave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just not going to let you see me eat it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, her mouth opens up and tentacles come out and -

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a good question. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We gotta take out the fuckers on the roof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to try to shoot them out? Or do you want me to take Pike and fuck their shit up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if you can flip them off the roof that would be awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what we're going to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, can we see anyone else?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're just going to fling them off of the roof?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I see duergar from any other perch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From your current position, you're up against the wall, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can back away and take up more of a case on it if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean if I took eagle form I could drop you and then I could just pick one up with my eagle talons and in the lava they go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does seem very dangerous and reckless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm keeping my Pass Without A Trace up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll just have to be fast. Be really speedy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can they see down to where we are? Does it just keep going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's been over an hour, we've killed nothing, we'll kill these fucks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So far only the two of them have really approached the stronghold and you guys have stayed back behind the elevations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a vampire. I need blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can all try, in theory, if you want to just stealth past them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take Pike up there. We knock those fuckers off, super easy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog runs out and brains them the second they hit the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or fall in the lava. You just gotta shove them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they'll fall in the lava pit, just shove them off the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. I don't know where they're going to fall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if they miss they miss the lava pit, we've got Grog.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I just say right now--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just be ready to let us know if you need help.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: --I'm going to be reading this book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hanging by Keyleth in case shit goes south.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god this is so stupid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give me the flying carpet just in case I need to fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or I can give you a ride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can get you up there. What can you do when we're up there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's something I've been wanting to do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh my word, this is fascinating!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But what do you say to get the magic carpet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please can I have the magic carpet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they staying in position, or are they walking around? Are they talking to each other at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you watch, you take a moment, still from the far back position, watch the two up there come together; they chat for a second, then a third one appears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then one of them rotates out for the one that just arrived.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them cleans his bow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they close to each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about twenty feet from each other along the top of the parapet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's three? There's three, not two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no, one came to swap out the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I’m just saying, I have been known to climb a few things in my time, if you need an extra.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any climbing gear or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. This is stupid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, they're standing twenty feet apart?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to watch this all go down with Bad News.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, me and you get ready to shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, range is how far away from you they are, and the radius is for the point of the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean a range of a spell, is how far from me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're going to bring them up if you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they carpeting up? How are you going up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you guys going to fly on me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, how are you guys going up? Eagle? Carpet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're climbing that shit, aren't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can get there like that. We're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, do it. Mission Impossible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. You ready? Do you know what you're going to do up there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not really, but let's just wing it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to knock them both off in one blow, but if I miss, you gotta take one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can charge them off if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. all right. I can take one if you can take one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be really quiet while you're fighting, try to take them out before they--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is awesome and nothing is going to go wrong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are we using the gnomes to throw people over?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't believe how they wrote this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We’re little people! You know why? Because I need someone with me and I can only take her, because that's the only other one who will fit through the Dimension Door with me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can take one person of my height or smaller.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach over and hold on to Pike gently, give her a little wink. And suddenly--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Exactly between the two of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a surprise round. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast Thunderwave and blast out from where I'm standing between them, 15 feet in either direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, 10 feet and 10 feet away from me.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thunderclap is loud. Thunderwave is different.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm pretty sure it's still thunder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thunderwave, looking it up real fast just to make sure of the situation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say thunderous force isn't a thunderclap,but it will make some noise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, fly up and cast Pass Without Trace on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys appear, you release Pike, you bring your arms up and slam your arms in a downward motion. As you do, there is a dull flash of light and a (boom noise) burst sound emanates from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one facing away gets blown up towards, slams into the side of the wall, right at the edge, and then topples over the side, both plummeting over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brief Wilhelm scream. You're standing there, you watch this happen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't have to do anything, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just killed two fuckers! Come on! It’s now or never, baby!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I think we’re alone now! ASHLEY & TRAVIS: (singing) Doesn’t seem to be anyone around! (all laugh)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, let’s just wait until we’re out of danger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it’s getting real romantic real quick, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was really hot, right? Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, both of the duergar come plummeting off the side of the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One manages to kind of loosely break his fall but the full 25 foot fall - he takes--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one that’s further away from the magma, the one that saw you, managed to reduce his damage a little bit because it was aware at least you were there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to kill these fuckers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I’m going to get some duergar!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slightly spreads at the wound. (choking sound) This gurgling sound, and you just have to kick him off the edge of your axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I can make one too! Ha ha! (all laugh)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run across to the other one and Thorn Whip him from across the lava pool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to jump over the lava to do that because he’s on the side you guys are on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Well then, is there anyone on the other side?

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get out of the room.

lines.text: This way? It ends. The hallway comes to an end, with a wall.

lines.text: Well then, I'm going to peek into this door here. This open door.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, thank you. So, down the one hall.

lines.text: Looking down this hallway, you see what resembles - there's a door to your left that's closed currently, and it splits off into two directions, right and left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just start to slink down the steps.

lines.text: Right and left? I go to the right.

lines.text: Why don’t we just go left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look past the right - you guys are all waiting in the room?

lines.text: And that's when I went to the right?

lines.text: Well, as soon as you went into where the division was, you turned to the right and there were duergar there, and a duergar on the left.

lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go kill this guy.

lines.text: As I notice him going up, I'm going to - (click) Vax, what are you doing?

lines.text: (humming a Muzak version of "The Girl from Ipanema")

lines.text: I'm going to sneak up on this duergar.

lines.text: Like a magician, you just whip it out, Matt.

lines.text: You missed entirely what I was telling you.
