lines.text: You can see him (gurgling SFX) double over for a second, but the hardy duergar once-dwarven form seems to shrug off a lot of the poison’s impact.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is still dribbling a very heavy amount of deep crimson from his mouth, but he still (gasps) looks over and sees you both in the hallway and goes to reach for his warhammer and turn around towards the door behind him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I throw an arrow at him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we roll for initiative at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys roll for initiative to see who goes first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn to Pike and say, “What the fuck is going on? Where are they?”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don’t know, but this book, Scanlan, is incredible.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It’s all about this, er, an ice thing--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let’s head down there. I’m going to head down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the rest of you are heading down there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There are so many prisoners down this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys both beat him on initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll attacks, both of you, just roll the dice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Getting a handle on my armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The poor guys is like: “Uh, I’m gonna--” (impact SFX, gurgle) He just goes down with this horrible sense of overkill, his body just slumps up against the door, leaning against the wooden door he was guarding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say on my earring: “I think we found the prison cells. Get down here.”

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start to loot the bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That’s not bad, that’s still not bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you wince as you notice it, but you make it down anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should have picked you up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm actually going to go ahead and throw Guidance on Pike now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it gives you a 1d4 plus to your-- (several talking at once)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they already knew [sic] we were here? Now they really know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the rest of you have made it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One with a closed door and one with an open door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, let's go look in the open door. Stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over into the open door, you can see what appears to be a series of dungeon cells held underneath the stronghold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within these, you can see there are a number of dwarven captives that are in very, very, very poor health--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get them awake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --that are currently lying down, unfed, gaunt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are any of them Lady Kima? Because if they're not, they're about to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they're regular dwarves, they're good people.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I go inspect them and see what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are people who've just been left to die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do a Mass Cure on them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go start inspecting the other door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you unlock the prison cells here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can you unlock the prison cells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we go in? Can we talk to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make them feel physically better for the moment, but their physical form itself is failing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a thought, shouldn't we clear this mess before we let prisoners out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both on the edge of death.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put them in the bag of holding, Grog.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I go to the room, I take out my bottle of water..

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear heavy footsteps coming from the stairway you guys just descended from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: MARISHA & TALIESIN: In the cells, in the cells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I push her into flanking position to the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh God, I nock an arrow, notch an arrow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The stairs, from where we entered?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I jump in the cells and I pull a dead, decomposing corpse over the top of me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eww, Keyleth. All kinds of nastiness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I find a corner of a cell and slowly pull out my gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I should make sure all the doors are shut, not locked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to move out of the way of the stairs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is scooching Scanlan out of the way to take that position right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The bear is at the back cell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's voices coming from the stairs?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there's a bear in the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I call, “Trinket, Trinket, Trinket (kissing SFX) Trinket!”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket barely hears you from way over at the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass as the footsteps slowly trail off.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I leave and turn around where Vex and Vax are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other door is currently locked from what you can tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is now not locked, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clicking SFX) You push the door open and you see immediately, the fast moving heft of some large blade towards your head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's a trap ready to hit me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you didn't check for traps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you were good at this shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use uncanny dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it's grinning, it pulls the axe out of the doorway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, I spit on the ground, and yank my belt off and throw it at his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you throw the belt--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, tell him to stop attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for snake attack against him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is my attack, his attack, snake attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll a 12 on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that will not hit unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he slaps it off himself and it (swish SFX) cascades off to the side of the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is a base attack a straight line from him to Vax to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point he kicks the door closed again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I, in my rage, bullrush through this?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he's going I immediately cast Stone Skin on myself. (cracking SFX)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What I like is that there are 8 of us and 1 of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Possibly, if no one else is behind that door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's in a room by himself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see the square, it's very small.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Percy, you're up first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are way back in this cell, and you hear a slam of broken wood and another slam of a door closing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run to the hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check to try and move through this cluster of people here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's the extent of your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try and take a shot and blow the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, with the Bad News or with your--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is just with the handheld, shooting at the lock at the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All I'm gonna do is grab the hole of the door and yank it open and yell, “Your turn, Grog!”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hot irons, you can see large pincers--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it's like a torture chamber?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dwarf backs up with his axe getting ready.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I use my bonus action to say, “You are so fucked, dwarf.” (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Move, Trinket. Get out the way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to make your way, squeeze past Percy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The bear surprisingly smells really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Tiberius, what do you want to do now?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to cast Hold Person on the dwarf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have visual on the dwarf currently, the dwarf is back--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have enough movement to get close enough, unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A wondrous use of an action.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do it! Do it, Grog! Destroy them! With no regard to any of his existence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the best line of the night! (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so with the dead body, I hear what's going on - we're roleplaying it up!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Get the body off of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And as I morph into Minxy form, I take the dead body that's on top of me and just pick it up with my mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was supposed to be - I wanted the dead one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I drop that one and find a dead one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you wanted a dead one. It is now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spend the entire game being the worst person in the world.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! I try so hard, you guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try so hard, I'm still the fucking worst!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, go ahead, do something else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least it's not gamey, it’s fresh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth tries. Keyleth tries so hard.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're not trying hard enough, damn it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you man, all right? I'm having a tough day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear a little dwarf in the corner go: "Mommy?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I’m having all these memories coming back, I'm on the brink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's some PTSD coming through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I've got this now-dead corpse in my mouth and I come out around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you’re still moving through this clustered hallway with a dead dwarf in your mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I have an advantage? Oh, I rolled a 15. Plus being a tiger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. You manage to push through, you're leaping through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pouncy. And I come out into the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're really pushing for space here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very, very tight quarters for you, you're like - (struggling SFX)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Keyleth, as a cat, you smell less good as Trinket does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not me, it's the dead body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I look at the dwarf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see him from your vantage point, he's actually back out of sight.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't see him, you can't see him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No? Can I shift to see him at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just know there's some sort of commotion going on. You move around the corner and you see just an empty room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody give up your turn to Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, let him go in the room.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just let Grog deal with this butthole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Grog and I foam at the mouth a little bit with the corpse and I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just gnawing on the dead dwarf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I smack Grog on the ass and say, "Go get him".

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he get advantage because we're all encouraging violence?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't kill him in one shot, it's very very disappointing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said the room was full of shiny pointy things on the wall, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to bull rush the dwarf up and against the wall, try and spear him with all the sharp shit on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's nasty. Okay then, so for the-- (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Instant karma's going to get you, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush in and with your first attack, you grab him, lift him, and you can see there's a series of giant meat hooks hanging from the back of the wall, and you just lift him up and (impaling SFX) shove him down onto the hook which protrudes from the front of his chest. (gurgling SFX)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, perfect. Tell me I get another attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 12 points of damage and he's currently restrained by the hook through his chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perfect! With my second attack as he's screaming out I reach inside, grab his lower jaw and pull him straight down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I love this so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is using his free hand to cover his eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Go ahead and roll damage on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For flavor, roll a 12. Why not? You're pulling his jaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With this horrible (choking SFX) sound, as you put all your muscle into it, glaring him in the face with a terrible grin you (breaking SFX) and yank the jaw off from the bottom of his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, clutching the jaw with one hand, you begin to pummel him in the face over and over, with his jaw, as he's watching, his head slowly cave in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's going to make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until eventually, he's no longer moving and you throw the jaw to the ground, just coated with blood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to pull through, buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike! I think Grog, um, I think he did his job.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I scream out, "Good job Grog! That's your best one yet!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you've entered the room now--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see bunch of scars and wounds, blood pouring from each one of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I know how to disable the rack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can probably figure it out with a tinker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Do we know it's her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a tinker check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's her. It's gotta be her.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Whoever it is, we should help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I add? Is it proficiency bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? You take a moment and you manage to find where the winch to this machine is, where you can go ahead and release the tension and eventually the chains go a little more slack and (gasps) the halfling woman takes a deep breath and looks about the room a second, looks like there's a bit of a haze, but through the haze there's this constant anger and she looks down and goes: “So? Are you gonna let me go? “Come on! Release these chains!”

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, wait. Find out who she is first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we insight and make sure that it's really who she--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody else want to roll for insight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 5, 1. Pike, roll well. The twins fucked it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's not in her right mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very small room, only a few people can make it in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I do? What do I roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight to see if she's in her right mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's pretty apparent that whatever this woman is, she's been here a while and has been subjected to many, many horrible things and still has that spark of life to her, mainly out of vengeance, anger, and pain, but she does not seem to be overtly aggressive or trying to deceive you; just trying to get out of these fucking chains.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll do an Arcana check on her.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: See if there's like any kind of magical impurities in her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If she's under the Imperius Curse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, there's none.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pulling out my lockpicks and I'm going to start working on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to heal her with a little bit of a song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's been tortured to an extent you hadn't seen in person, and to still be tensing her muscles against the chains and looking at you with this intensity, if this is indeed Lady Kima, you now see why she's made the reputation she has.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, the locking mechanism on this is jammed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks to you for a second and says, “It's been a while since I've heard a song. Thank you.”

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can someone cover her ears for just a second?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to utility shot - I'm going to put my gun against the lock, somewhere where it will not harm her and just blow it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to roll to hit, it's right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there's one chain for the legs, one chain for the arms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. 15 for the leg. 10 for the arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's enough for you, Grog, to-

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She (metal snapping SFX) pulls herself free from the metal binding--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “So, I take it you're not from around here?”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No! Would you like some water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She grabs it from you, pulls off the cork and just starts chugging like she hasn't had anything to drink in a long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Kima, we need to get you out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks around and says, “Look, we don't- it's a story. I have no--” And she kind of points to her pretty much unclothed, unarmored form, and says, “I need to find my implements. We need to get out of here.”

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I offer to you this black, studded leather, dwarven armor? It's not leather, actually.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Would you care for this robe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What armor were you offering her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her whole body is just sore, but she still pushes through it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to heal her a little bit more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry. You're not fully healed, let me help you out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do, she takes a moment and she says - You heal her and she goes, “Can I-” She sees your mace and goes, “Can I borrow that for a second?”

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you need it for? (all laugh)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. This is all I have to protect myself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you gonna give it back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hand it out, she grabs it from your hands--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --walks to the edge of the table--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there's this look of anger, frustration--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, after this frenzy, you're all taken aback, and she takes a moment. (heavy breathing) There is very little left recognizable of what once was a duergar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She takes the mace she borrowed from you. (splatter sound)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're very welcome. I'm sorry I questioned you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Give her something, Grog! Let her use one of your things!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Like, you know, give her one of your things, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I, um, would you like to touch my axe? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “If you want to part with it, certainly.“

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we collect your things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, where are they? Do you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would assume they're being stored upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “They're either in the vault or they're in the armory.”

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vault or the armory? Those are places that we can go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there stairs in the room that we're in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “As far as I can tell, my--”

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they of vital importance, the things you've lost?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “Not to mention, that what we may face beyond this, “we'll need every bit of help we can get.”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You'll have a friend in us, that's for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go to the vault! Let's go upstairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know where the vault is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go up to her, still in my Minxy form, and I rub on her legs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you dropped the body yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I get right up behind them too, competing for space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you dragging a dead body around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, first, I buried my shame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't look at you, but she pats you absentmindedly as she passes you, her direct intent on heading back up those stairs herself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go, but should we unlock all the other dwarves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, let's let all the other dwarves out, and maybe give them some food to try to help them out, if we can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the meantime, I have a greatsword or a morningstar mace that you can have until we find your items.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe a little more than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as you hand it to her, she still takes it, and you can see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has seen some war, and she has survived some shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As I see her grab the sword, I ask, “Would you care for some ale?” (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances over her shoulder at you, and says, “Later. We have nothing to celebrate for yet.”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the ones that was semi-conscious--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of that, I say all of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sits up and looks back at you and - (ragged breathing) “Thank ye. Thank ye kindly.”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it hungrily through the bars and just starts eating it, incessantly, as you leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lady Kima's already up the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Clean this off here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be fun! Savage burning--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm right with Minxy, competing for first place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I place a hand on Lady Kima’s shoulder--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First place, for how fucked-up we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --place a hand on Kima's shoulder and say, “Please, allow me,” and move several feet ahead of her and start sneaking along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move up to her, you notice she's standing at the bottom of the stairs with a tension, staring up at the top of the stairway, where Clarota is looking down at her--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He, uh, she's fine, he's fine. His name is Clarota.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without taking her eyes off of Clarota--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “Are you to tell me that you've come down here “and allied yourself with an entity that is the anathema of the Mountain?”

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm right at her shoulder, so I say, “We understand he's dangerous, but he's gotten us this far.”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “And for what purpose? “You think they don't have plots lined out for weeks and months--”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “--there is no trust to be had with these creatures.”

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we are working together, in this moment, and without him we would not have gotten here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We see a single tear drop from Clarota's eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “And with him you will never get out.”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There's a greater entity controlling his people, which he has been outcast from, like Vax was saying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “And have you not thought for a second “that perhaps all of you are being manipulated by this creature?”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the greatsword now flares with divine energy and she goes, “I will not stand here and let us ally ourselves with this filth!”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I use Control Flames to create a bunch of swords around me with fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her attention divided from Clarota, now tends towards you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The words he speaks are true. And we believe him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Oh my god, she's so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “Listen. You come with me. Without this creature! “Or you continue with it, and without me.”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Why you have to be like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “It will lead you into a web of your own destruction! “I've seen their kind work.“

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: - we had to kill a couple and he actually helped a lot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Speak your mind! Convince her. Fix this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota, at the top of the stairs, you can see his tendrils in his mouth curl back in a sneer, his hands crossed before--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “I will not wake up with this--”

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Giving us a Walking Dead decision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “--woman's blade in my back! We made a deal.”

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: People with kids. You deal with this all the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk between them and put hands out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: “Kima. Tell us. What is it that you've come here for? “What is your purpose here? Speak your mind, if you are true.”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “I've come here to rid this mountain and this continent “of the darkness that resides deep within the bowels “of this thing's city!”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “Ah, I've come to destroy this creature K'Varn and free my people.”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “What do you think will happen once his people are free? “Shall they let us walk out on our own?”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes! He said so! And then they'll be buttholes when we leave!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “You know so very little of these dark caverns, my dragon friend.”

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, it's our first time here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “These entities I watched steal the very life essence “of the men and women I hired and travelled with “for weeks down here. I watched them capture them, “and devour their very minds before me, “and laugh and cackle as I fled into the shadows.”

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they were under control of K'Varn at that point. Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're intending us to choose between you, and our ally Clarota, and we can't get you to see eye to eye with us, then I'm afraid you leave us no choice but to choose our own friend Clarota over you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “So you walk in here, save me from my binds, “under the words of my dear, lifelong friend Arcanist Allura--”

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is you who are aggravating the situation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could be sitting in a cell by yourself doing fuck-all, or ending this problem now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so nervous! Oh, Scanlan, come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I have a plus 13! So that's a 16.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He assisted because he was talking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it's too late. Once the roll--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he was with me, he was with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's a few inches taller than you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course she is! Everyone is! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “And I have very little allies at this point to achieve my goal.”

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “One single misstep, and I will not hesitate “to carve that head from your body in the name of Bahamut.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm sorry. Do you mean like dancing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will help you do that if he missteps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its tendrils in its mouth kind of-- (slurping SFX) (breathy voice) “And please, understand, “if you ever intend to try and cut my life short, “I will also not hesitate to bore that beautiful mind from your skull.”

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose everybody understands everyone now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: “Because if it's not, none of us will make it out of here alive.”

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're playing a game of chess here, Kima, and we will win.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I whisper in her ear: “I would have chosen you.”

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laughing) SAM (singing softly): Kumbaya, my lord. Kumbaya.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I take the dagger and make a happy face of fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't notice this, as she steps up the stairs towards Clarota.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Killing two guards on the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? No. What time is it? I thought we just got started?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got like ten more minutes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we have ten more minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no. That's fine, that's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, yeah, that is a good place, or we're going to get in a battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Depending on where you guys are going next it could be a bit of a lengthy encounter, so...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one has any idea that you're here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, show of hands, if we have to pick between one or the other, who's picking Kima?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to throw down, this is gonna be Marvel versus DC in this bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just want her because she's badass and you could hump her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be the most awkward humping ever.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's a good idea. Grog! You can go hump, I can get Allura.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you see her work in that room of blood?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only one of them is demanding that I become a liar.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, dang it! I wanted to take some torture weapons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go back if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, can I go back since we have ten minutes and go get some torture weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be pretty quick, you have to grab some things as everyone is heading up the stairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's your deity? Harvey Keitel? (More laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Pike, the war priest, however, who the light of Sarenrae has guided her through her life, once a gifted being of light and joy, upon coming to the edge of death, her soul taken from her form and returned, going at sea and traveling with some of the more rough and tumble folks of the landscape, has returned now with her mind bent on war, vengeance--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watching Pike rush off and going to gather up what appear to be two large, bladed hooks--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, wait, hold on. Lengthy hand-razor...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to go Sweeney Todd all up in this shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what was the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost like a bladed jai alai.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you gather a small bag of various instruments that are rusty and nasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all you have time to grab before you have to bolt back up to get to the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, thank you guys all for watching.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pain in the ass, Lady Kima. Pain in my ass.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I was doing my little pop-ins here.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So we had some donations to the charity.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So I wrote these myself and I'm supposed to read them and...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poltergeist123, yeah. All good movies. First two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: RuzGofDi! Thank you guys so much for donating! Really appreciate it.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Every Friday night we have live music and bands play and stuff.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And tomorrow we're having a special party to celebrate our reaching 2000 subscribers.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You guys are all welcome to stop by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We might just do that. Awesome.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And Super Fight and stuff like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As if there was appropriate Cards Against Humanity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love to have you guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, it's a good workout after all this food.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You burn some calories after all that chicken, right?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So as long as we're live, the giveaway counts.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So, let's throw the dropcam up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah guys, thank you so much! (kiss)
